comment: He really is a good professor and clearly cares about the class he's teaching. There are a lot of assignments, but they are relatively easy and quick. There is a group project but he gives you plenty of time, and doesn't penalize you for group members not pulling their weight. There's a lot of extra credit assignments as well to keep your grade up.
AMAZING PROFESSOR! Easy class lots of work but its really easy. Professor is amazing and always helpful outside of class.

Dr.Payne is not bad! All of the work is on a science site where answers can be found on Quizlet. 4 tests & 1 final. The tests are lockdown/cam, but he shows you a preview of all of the questions before hand! There is SO much extra credit! Some of the labs you can turn in for extra credit & he will give you an automatic 100. Don't be scared to take!

I took this class as an elective, and I thoroughly enjoyed learning about astronomy with this professor. Despite it being an online class, the interactive software we used during the semester was very informative. The professor gave detailed feedback with many large assignments, and communicated what could be done to improve.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Overall I Liked having this professor for my physics class, the tests weren't too hard once you figured out how they work, he'll include questions from each previous test in the next one so as long as you make sure to practice a bit and make an honest effort on the homework you will do fine, even if this class is a bit time consuming at parts.

If you fail his class you literally just chose to fail! He is the sweetest he is too nice he gives a lot of chances to do his work he emails a lot of reminders and is VERY understanding if you need more time do any work! Yes at all up 6 questions super easy even repays questions from previous test to the next ones!! He even does test corrections!

The single worst professor I have had since I started elementary school. He is disorganized, overwhelms you with material, and is overall terrible. He should not be teaching in general. if you are considering taking this as a fun class, STAY AWAY! It's not fun and you will be drowning in work. The class average is a high 60s-low 70s.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: By far the worst professor I've had. His tests never correlate with the material we were learning, his lectures don't help to pass the tests. We had a power outage and he still expected everyone to take a test that same day regardless of everyone's situations. We explained this to him on numerous occasions and he doesn't do anything about it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader
